text: ricardo alfonso castellar, mayor of achi, in the northern department of bolivar, who was kidnapped on 5 january, apparently by army of national liberation (eln) guerrillas, was found dead today, according to authorities. ... the group was traveling in a 4-wheel drive vehicle between cucuta and the rural area known as campanario when their vehicle was blown up by four explosive charges that detonated on the highway.

answers.incidentLocation: between cucuta and the rural area known as campanario

text: a ucr (radical civic union) buenos aires province committee spokesman today reported that a ucr district headquarters in buenos aires province was "completely destroyed by a bomb explosion." the destroyed ucr headquarters is in the moreno district of buenos aires.

official sources reported several guerrilla attacks the evening of 9 january and this morning. alleged guerrilla urban commandos launched two highpower bombs against a car dealership in downtown san salvador this morning. later, urban commandos bombed two electricity facilities in different places in san salvador.

two bomb attacks were carried out in la paz last night... the first bomb attack occurred in front of the planning and economic coordination ministry... a bomb was placed outside government house in the parking lot used by cabinet ministers.

the mnr reports the disappearance and kidnapping of mnr assistant secretary general hector oqueli colindres in guatemala city today, 12 january. according to reports, oqueli and his companion gilda flores were abducted by heavily armed men as they were heading to la aurora airport.

authorities reported that former peruvian defense minister general enrique lopez albujar died today in lima as a consequence of a terrorist attack. he was riddled with bullets by three young individuals as he was getting out of his car in an open parking lot in the residential neighborhood of san isidro.
